title: Frame Skipping on High-End PCs

embed.description: We're aware of an issue that causes frame skipping in high-end PCs. This can manifest in a few ways: The screen seems to "shake" back and forth as the camera moves around the map, especi...

body: Just bought a new expensive PC, spent 5 hours trying to fix it because I thought i build it wrong because League was all glitchy and my Character model was stuttering and skipping, Turns out Riot made a thread about it. Just got my new PC and excited to test it, the suggestions made by Riot didn't help me, if anyone knows how to fix is other ways or is having similar issues please let me know, Riot please bug-fix this.

replies.body: What worked for me was deinstalling any programs like "f.lux" that change your brightness and/or color settings. Hope that helps.

What GPU have you got? If you have Nvidia I'd recommend going into Geforce Experience and using your own settings for the game rather than the recommended, I've had issues with that before. The other thing of course is making sure your drivers are up to date.
